functions.name: arxiv_auto_search_and_download
functions.description: Based on user input, search relevant papers on arxiv. If parameter "download" is True, than download the found papers.

query.description: Related information of the papers that the user wants to find.

download.description: If true, download the found papers, if false, not download. This is an optional parameter, and default option is false.

top_k_results.description: The most relevant top_k_results article (if there are so many). This is an optional parameter, and default option is 3. This parameter takes effect only when "download" is set true.

functions.name: summary
functions.description: Summarize the content of the paper(in PDF or Word format).

filename.description: The name of the paper to summarize.
